item.description: The weather forecast is looking like Sunday is a great day to be above treeline so why not visit Washington. Monica and I are staying in Lincoln and I am doing this write-up on my phone - call me if interested in joining us. Full winter clothing and gear is required. Michael(978)808-1932
item.why: The weather is supposed to be perfect for an above treeline day - what a great way to end the winter season.
item.name: It's a great day to visit George
